subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: After a successful workout that included about 10 minutes of pitching off flat ground, Pedro Martínez said he would throw 45 pitches Wednesday night for the Mets’ Class A team.
snippet: After a successful workout that included about 10 minutes of pitching off flat ground, Pedro Martínez said he would throw 45 pitches Wednesday night for the Mets’ Class A team.
